name: The Adventures of Janitor Smithers
description:
This game was made for the AardJam #2 hosted on itch.io.

The theme for this jam was: "Saved by the bell".

You play as Janitor Smithers. He needs to look over a class of students. The goal of the game is to survive the class without getting a heart attack. Students will start to misbehave if you walk too far away from them. Misbehaving students will increase the heart rate of janitor Smithers. Walk up to students to keep them from misbehaving.

Controls: 

Left Mouse Button = walk / skip dialogue.

(The mouse pointer will turn green if you can walk to its spot).

Escape = exit game.

Made in Game Maker Studio 2 by IkonHero
